description: The file defines a Flutter widget called AppSearchBar, which provides a customizable search input field with optional internal controller, clear functionality, and a submit button. It serves as a reusable search bar component for Flutter applications.

classes.name: AppSearchBar
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing a rounded search bar with prefix icon, clear button, and submit button.

classes.name: _AppSearchBarState
classes.description: State class managing the internal logic and UI for AppSearchBar widget.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the search input and triggers onChanged callback with empty string.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Triggers onSubmit callback with the current trimmed text.
